meanings.definition: A person who uses the social media platform Twitter.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a tweeps and loves sharing updates online.
meanings.sent2: I follow many tweeps who post interesting tweets.
meanings.sent3: The tweeps on Twitter are like a big online community.
meanings.sent4: In the world of social media, tweeps are the stars of Twitter.
meanings.sent5: The term tweeps refers to active users of Twitter.

meanings.definition: The group of people who follow a specific Twitter user.
meanings.sent1: As a popular influencer, she has thousands of tweeps following her.
meanings.sent2: When I tweet, my tweeps engage with my posts.
meanings.sent3: The tweeps of famous celebrities often retweet their tweets.
meanings.sent4: Her loyal tweeps support her through likes and comments.
meanings.sent5: Tweeps can create a strong sense of online community around a user.
